name: Forest Path North of the Swamp
description: You're on an overgrown path in the dense forest. It continues to the north and south. To the south, the land looks wetter and more swampy. You can smell a putrid stench coming from the south.

features.look: It's a path through the long grass and underbrush. It's completely overgrown. It hasn't seen traffic in a long time, except for maybe animals.
